basics.name: Matthew Kouchi
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2023.

work.company: University of Hawaii at Manoa College of Engineering
work.summary: Focus in research of microwave electronics incorporating liquid-metals
highlights: Design and simulate microwave and mmwave electronics in full wave electromagnetic solvers
Fabricate microchannel devices using micromilling and photolithography techniques for use with small volumes on liquid metal
Create 2D layered photomasks for C-band designs using CAD softwares
Synchronize multiple testbed equipments using Virtual Instrument Software Architectures (VISA)
Collaborate with research partners in the publishing of journal and conference papers in the area of metasurfaces

volunteer.summary: Social volunteer work for future leaders
highlights: Participated in community clean up efforts along Oahu's coast
Engaged in leadership building social events

volunteer.summary: Microwaves Theory and Techniques Society student chapter at the University of Hawaii at Manoa
highlights: Helped organize speaker seminars with industry professionals
Collaborated with the main Hawaii chapter to host social events

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students with an exceptional academic record for maintaining above a 3.5 GPA
